card.name: Cellar
card.text: +1 Action, Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded.

card.name: Chapel
card.text: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.

card.name: Moat
card.text: +2 Cards, When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, you are unaffected by that Attack.

card.name: Chancellor
card.text: +2 Coins, You may immediately put your deck into your discard pile.

card.name: Village
card.text: +1 Card, +2 Actions.

card.name: Woodcutter
card.text: +1 Buy, +2 Coins.

card.name: Workshop
card.text: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.

card.name: Bureaucrat
card.text: Gain a silver card; put it on top of your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from his hand and puts it on his deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).

card.name: Feast
card.text: Trash this card. Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins.

card.name: Gardens
card.text: Variable, Worth 1 Victory for every 10 cards in your deck (rounded down).

card.name: Militia
card.text: +2 Coins, Each other player discards down to 3 cards in his hand.

card.name: Moneylender
card.text: Trash a Copper from your hand. If you do, +3 Coins.

card.name: Remodel
card.text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 2 Coins more than the trashed card.

card.name: Smithy
card.text: +3 Cards.

card.name: Spy
card.text: +1 Card, +1 Action, Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your chouce.

card.name: Thief
card.text: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck. If they revealed any Treasure cards, they trash one of them that you choose. You may gain any or all of these trashed cards. They discard the other revealed cards.

card.name: Throne Room
card.text: Choose an Action card in your hand. Play it twice.

card.name: Council Room
card.text: +4 Cards, +1 Buy, Each other player draws a card.

card.name: Festival
card.text: +2 Actions, +1 Buy, +2 Coins.

card.name: Laboratory
card.text: +2 Cards, +1 Action.

card.name: Library
card.text: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand. You may set aside any Action cards drawn this way, as you draw them; discard the set aside cards after you finish drawing.

card.name: Market
card.text: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, +1 Coin.

card.name: Mine
card.text: Trash a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a Treasure card costing up to 3 Coins more; put it into your hand.

card.name: Witch
card.text: +2 Cards, Each other player gains a Curse card.

card.name: Adventurer
card.text: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Treasure cards. Put those Treasure cards in your hand and discard the other revealed cards.
